page: CE39008: Civil Engg. Drawing And Est.

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Building drawing: Components of buildings - Plan, elevation and section of buildings; Estimation - types of estimates, Central line method, short wall - long wall method, Modes of measurement, estimation of buildings, basis of rate analysis.
page: CE39008: Civil Engg. Drawing And Est.
